children.name: Cyral - Application Activity Details
children.description: Dashboard that provides specific information regarding an application.
children.title: Cyral - Application Activity Details

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","client.applicationName" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group")
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].accessType" as accessType
| where accessType CONTAINS "read" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| count

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","response.message","client.applicationName","response.executionTimeNanos" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") and !isNull(%"response.message") and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| %"response.executionTimeNanos" / 1000000 as executionTimeInMS
| avg(executionTimeInMS)

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","response.message","client.applicationName","response.records" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") and !isNull(%"response.message") and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| avg(%"response.records")

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","response.message","client.applicationName","response.bytes" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") and !isNull(%"response.message") and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| avg(%"response.bytes")

panels.title: User Statement Type Trend by Sum of Records

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","client.applicationName","response.records","request.statementType" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") AND %"identity.endUser" matches "*" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| timeslice 15m
| sum(%"response.records") by _timeslice, %"request.statementType"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"request.statementType"

panels.title: Statement Type Breakdown by Sum of Records

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","client.applicationName","response.records","request.statementType" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") AND %"identity.endUser" matches "*" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| sum(%"response.records") by %"request.statementType"

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","client.applicationName","activityTime","response.records","response.bytes","repo.name","identity.repoUser","client.connectionId" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "*" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"|first(%"activityTime") as SessionStart, last(%"activityTime") as SessionEnd, sum(%"response.records") as Records, sum(%"response.bytes") as Bytes by %"repo.name", %"identity.repoUser", %"identity.group", %"client.connectionId"
| sort by SessionEnd desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","client.applicationName","response.records","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "*" AND %"identity.endUser" matches "*" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords by %"repo.name"
| sort by TotalRecords desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

panels.title: Top {{topKLimit}} End Users By Sum Records

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","client.applicationName","response.records" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "*" AND %"identity.endUser" matches "*" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords by %"identity.endUser"
| sort by TotalRecords desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","client.applicationName","response.records","client.host" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "*" AND %"identity.endUser" matches "*" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}"
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords by %"client.host"
| sort by TotalRecords desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolations[*].policyName" as policyName nodrop
| json "policyViolations[*].severity" as policySeverity nodrop
| json "policyViolations[*].accessType" as accessType nodrop
| json "policyViolated" as policyViolated nodrop
| json "client.applicationName" as applicationName nodrop
| where policyViolated="true" and applicationName matches "{{applicationName}}"
| count as Violations by policyName,policySeverity,accessType
| sort by Violations desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].accessType" as accessType nodrop
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].dataset" as dataset nodrop
| json "client.applicationName","response.records","identity.endUser","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}" and accessType="[\"read\"]"
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords, count(accessType) as Queries by %"identity.endUser", %"repo.name", dataset

($$logsrc )
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].accessType" as accessType nodrop
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].dataset" as dataset nodrop
| json "client.applicationName","request.statementType","response.records","identity.endUser","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"client.applicationName" matches "{{applicationName}}" and %"request.statementType" IN ("DELETE","UPDATE","INSERT")
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords, count(accessType) as Queries by %"identity.endUser", %"repo.name", dataset

children.name: Cyral - Data Monitoring Activity
children.description: Dashboard that provides a view of how users and groups are accessing data and the types of queries they are executing against the data.
children.title: Cyral - Data Monitoring Activity

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes","identity.group","request.statementType" nodrop
| where %"activityTypes" contains "query" AND %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, %"identity.group"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"identity.group"

($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes","identity.group","request.statementType" nodrop
| where %"activityTypes" contains "query" and %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"|if(isBlank(%"identity.group"), "blank", %"identity.group") as myField
| where myField != "blank"
| count by %"identity.group", %"request.statementType"
| transpose row %"identity.group" column %"request.statementType" as *

($$logsrc )
| json "request.fieldsAccessed[*].label" as fieldLabel nodrop
| json "identity.group" as SSOGroup nodrop
| json "request.statementType" nodrop
| where SSOGroup matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| count by fieldLabel, SSOGroup

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","activityTypes","identity.endUser" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}" AND %"activityTypes" CONTAINS "query"
| count_distinct(%"identity.endUser")

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","activityTime","identity.endUser","identity.repoUser" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| first(%"activityTime") by %"identity.endUser", %"identity.group", %"identity.repoUser"
| now()-30d as expireTime|parseDate(_first, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as parsedDate
| where expireTime > parsedDate
| count

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].accessType" as accessType nodrop
| where accessType CONTAINS "read"
| count

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","response.message","response.executionTimeNanos" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}" and !isNull(%"response.message")
| %"response.executionTimeNanos" / 1000000 as executionTimeInMS
| avg(executionTimeInMS)

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","response.message","response.records" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}" and !isNull(%"response.message")
| avg(%"response.records")

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","response.message","response.bytes" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}" and !isNull(%"response.message")
| avg(%"response.bytes")

($$logsrc)
| json "request.fieldsAccessed[*].label" as fieldLabel nodrop
| json "identity.group","request.statementType" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| count by %"identity.group", %"request.statementType"

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","identity.endUser" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, %"identity.endUser"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"identity.endUser"

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","identity.endUser" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| count by %"identity.endUser", %"request.statementType"
| transpose row %"identity.endUser" column %"request.statementType"

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","activityTime","identity.endUser","identity.repoUser" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{GroupName}}" AND %"request.statementType" matches "{{StatementType}}"
| first(%"activityTime") by %"identity.endUser", %"identity.group", %"identity.repoUser"

children.name: Cyral - Policy Summary
children.description: Dashboard that provides high level information regarding policy violations and queries that do not have policies applied.
children.title: Cyral - Policy Summary

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "true" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "true" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count_distinct(%"repo.name")

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name","client.applicationName" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "true" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count_distinct(%"client.applicationName")

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name","identity.endUser" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "true" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count_distinct(%"identity.endUser")

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name","activityTime","identity.endUser","identity.group","identity.repoUser" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" matches "*" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"|first(%"activityTime") by %"identity.endUser", %"identity.group", %"identity.repoUser"
| now()-30d as expireTime|parseDate(_first, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as parsedDate
| where expireTime > parsedDate
| count

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name","identity.endUser" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "true" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| count as Count by %"identity.endUser"
| sort by Count desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "true" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| json "policyViolations[*].policyName" as policyName
| count as Violations by policyName
| sort by Violations desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

panels.title: Top {{topKLimit}} Policies Not Used in Past 30 Days

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name","activityTime" nodrop
| json "policyViolations[*].policyName" as policyName nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" matches "*" and policyName matches "*" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| first(%"activityTime") by policyName| now()-30d as expireTime|parseDate(_first, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as parsedDate
| where expireTime > parsedDate|count as Count by policyName
| sort by Count desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","sidecar.name","repo.name","request.datasetsAccessed","request.statementType" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "false" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" AND isNull(%"request.datasetsAccessed")
| count as Count by %"request.statementType"
| sum(Count) by %"request.statementType"

($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","request.statementType","sidecar.name","repo.name","request.datasetsAccessed","request.statement" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "false" and %"request.statementType" = "SELECT" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and isNull(%"request.datasetsAccessed")
| count as Count by %"repo.name", %"request.statement"
| sort by Count desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

panels.title: Bottom {{topKLimit}} SELECT Queries Without a Policy

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "policyViolated","request.statementType","sidecar.name","repo.name","request.datasetsAccessed","request.statement","response.records","client.connectionTime","identity.group","identity.endUser","client.applicationName","client.host" nodrop
| where %"policyViolated" = "false" and %"request.statementType" = "SELECT" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and isNull(%"request.datasetsAccessed")
| parse regex field=%"request.statement" "^SELECT (?<Fields>.*) FROM (?<TableName>[a-z_\.\-A-Z$]*\b)"
| count as Count, sum(%"response.records") as recordsRead by %"repo.name", %"client.connectionTime", %"identity.group", %"identity.endUser", %"client.applicationName", %"client.host", Fields, TableName
| sort by Count asc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

children.name: Cyral - Security Summary
children.description: Dashboard that provides high level information regarding suspicious activity.
children.title: Cyral - Security Summary

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes","sidecar.name","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"activityTypes" in ("[\"authenticationFailure\"]", "[\"portScan\"]") and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| timeslice
| count by _timeslice, %"activityTypes"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"activityTypes"

($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes","repo.name","sidecar.name" nodrop
| where %"activityTypes" in ("[\"authenticationFailure\"]", "[\"portScan\"]") and !isNull(%"repo.name") and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| timeslice|count by _timeslice, %"repo.name"| transpose row _timeslice column %"repo.name"

($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes","sidecar.name","repo.name","client.host" nodrop
| where %"activityTypes" in ("[\"authenticationFailure\"]", "[\"portScan\"]") and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip=%"client.host" 
| count as Count by latitude, longitude
| sort Count

($$logsrc)
| json "activityTypes","sidecar.name","repo.name","client.host" nodrop
| where %"activityTypes" in ("[\"authenticationFailure\"]", "[\"portScan\"]") and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code from geo://location on ip=%"client.host"
| lookup type, actor, threatlevel from sumo://threat/cs on threat = %"client.host"
| count as Count by %"client.host", country_code, type, actor, threatlevel
| sort by Count desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes","sidecar.name","repo.name","identity.repoUser","identity.endUser","activityTime","client.host","client.applicationName" nodrop
| where %"activityTypes" contains "authenticationFailure" and %"sidecar.name" matches "{{sidecar_name}}" and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| lookup type, actor, threatlevel from sumo://threat/cs on threat = %"client.host"
| count as Count by %"identity.repoUser", %"identity.endUser", %"repo.name", %"activityTime", %"client.host",type,actor,threatlevel, %"client.applicationName"
| sort by %"activityTime" desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

children.name: Cyral - User Activity Details
children.description: Dashboard that provides specific information regarding a user.
children.title: Cyral - User Activity Details

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") and %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].accessType" as accessType
| where accessType CONTAINS "read"
| count

($$logsrc )
|json "identity.group","response.message","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.executionTimeNanos" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") and !isNull(%"response.message") and %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| %"response.executionTimeNanos" / 1000000 as executionTimeInMS
| avg(executionTimeInMS)

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","response.message","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.records" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") and !isNull(%"response.message") and %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| avg(%"response.records")

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.bytes" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") and !isNull(%"response.message") and %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| avg(%"response.bytes")

panels.title: User Statement Type Trend by Sum of Records

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.records" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") AND %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| timeslice 15m
| sum(%"response.records") by _timeslice, %"request.statementType"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"request.statementType"

panels.title: Statement Type Breakdown by Sum of Records

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.records" nodrop
| where !isNull(%"identity.group") AND %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| sum(%"response.records") by %"request.statementType"

panels.title: {{topKLimit}}  Most Recent Sessions by Session End

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","activityTime","response.records","response.bytes","repo.name","identity.repoUser","client.connectionId" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| first(%"activityTime") as SessionStart, last(%"activityTime") as SessionEnd, sum(%"response.records") as Records, sum(%"response.bytes") as Bytes by %"repo.name", %"identity.repoUser", %"identity.group", %"client.connectionId"
| sort by SessionEnd desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.records","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "*" AND %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords by %"repo.name"
| sort by TotalRecords desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.records","client.applicationName" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords by %"client.applicationName"
| sort by TotalRecords desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

panels.title: Top {{topKLimit}}  Repo Users By Sum Records

queries.queryString:
(($$logsrc ))
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.records","identity.repoUser" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "*" AND %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords by %"identity.repoUser"
| sort by TotalRecords desc
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","response.records","repo.name" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and (%"request.statementType"="DELETE" or %"request.statementType"="INSERT" or %"request.statementType"="UPDATE")
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].accessType" as accessType nodrop
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].dataset" as dataSet nodrop
| sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords, count(accessType) as QueryTypes by %"identity.endUser", %"repo.name", dataSet

($$logsrc)
| json "policyViolations[*].policyName" as policyName nodrop
| json "policyViolations[*].severity" as policySeverity nodrop
| json "policyViolations[*].accessType" as policyAccessType nodrop
| json "identity.group","identity.endUser","request.statementType","policyViolated" nodrop
| where %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}" and %"policyViolated"="true"
| count as Violations by policyName, policySeverity, policyAccessType
| sort by Violations
| limit {{topKLimit}}

($$logsrc )
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].accessType" as dataSetAccessType nodrop
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].dataset" as dataSetAccessedDataSet nodrop
| json "identity.group","repo.name","response.records","identity.endUser","request.statementType" nodrop
| where dataSetAccessType contains "read" and %"identity.group" matches "{{Group}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{endUser}}" and %"request.statementType" matches "{{statementType}}"
| count(dataSetAccessType) as QueryTypes, sum(%"response.records") as TotalRecords by %"identity.endUser", %"repo.name", dataSetAccessedDataSet
| sort by QueryTypes
| limit {{topKLimit}}

sourceDefinition.query: ($$logsrc  )|json "identity.group" as groupName|where groupName matches "*"|count by groupName

($$logsrc  )
|json "request.statementType" as statementType|where statementType matches "*"|count by statementType
